SOC Driver

The SOC Driver allows the application developers to use the following sub-modules:

  • MSS RCM
  • MSS TOP RCM
  • DSS

The SOC header file should be included in an application as follows:

#include <ti/drivers/soc.h>

Initializing the driver

The SOC Driver needs to be initialized once across the System. This is done using the SOC_init. None of the SOC API can be used without invoking this API

Register Layer

Refer to the soc/include directory for the register layers definitons for the following modules: RCM : soc/include/reg_rcm.h TOP RCM : soc/include/reg_toprcm.h DSS : soc/include/reg_dssreg.h
